caption: Simon Vouet (French, 1590–1649), formerly attributed to school of Laurent de la Hyre (French, 1605–1656), formerly attributed to Nicolas Poussin (French, 1594–1665), St. Peter Healing the Sick with His Shadow. Brown wash over black chalk; 36.2 × 22.2 cm. Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr. (x1953-103)
